title: (x) Serif font - Baskerville {Eduardo}
content:
Does anybody know the name of this font?   
I'm really bad with serif ones.   
thanks ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010231im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/10745.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Dallas Mavericks logo - TF Cavalier A Bold {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/104 "Go to previous forum topic") [Oklahoma State ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080401010231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/11037 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fermello78

comments.content: Well, at the risk of sounding like a broken record, I'm going to say this looks like Baskerville.
Oy! Beat me to it, Eduardo. :-)
